title: Do I need to have an engineering degree to work as an air traffic controller? - Quora

response.answer_text: No,Regular full time Bachelor’s Degree (3 years) in Science (http://B.Sc.) with Physics and Mathematics from a recognized university, is sufficient to apply for junior executive atc. This eligibility criteria is for aviation authority of India

What are the basic educational qualifications (degrees) needed to apply for the civil ATC entrance exam? Engineering Degree in Electronics / Tele Communication / Radio Engg. / Electrical with specialization in Electronics with Ist class (60%) OR M.Sc Degree or its equivalent with Wireless Communication, Electronics, Radio Physics or Radio Engg. as a special Subject OR Equivalent with 1st Class
